trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="Using Azure AD Connect declarative provisioning" description="Learn how to use the Azure AD Connect declarative provisioning." services="active-directory" documentationCenter="" authors="billmath" manager="stevenpo" editor="curtand"/>
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="Using Azure AD Connect declarative provisioning" description="Learn how to use the Azure AD Connect declarative provisioning." services="active-directory" documentationCenter="" authors="billmath" manager="stevenpo" editor="curtand"/>

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="active-directory" ms.workload="identity" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/24/2015" ms.author="billmath"/>
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="active-directory" ms.workload="identity" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/24/2015" ms.author="billmath"/>

trans-unit.source: Declarative provisioning is "codeless" provisioning and can be setup and configured using the Synchronization Rules Editor.
trans-unit.target: Declarative provisioning is "codeless" provisioning and can be setup and configured using the Synchronization Rules Editor.

trans-unit.source: The Editor can be used setup and create your own provisioning rules.
trans-unit.target: The Editor can be used setup and create your own provisioning rules.

trans-unit.source: An essential part of Declarative Provisioning is the expression language used in attribute flows.
trans-unit.target: An essential part of Declarative Provisioning is the expression language used in attribute flows.

trans-unit.source: The language used is a subset of Microsoft® Visual Basic® for Applications (VBA).
trans-unit.target: The language used is a subset of Microsoft® Visual Basic® for Applications (VBA).

trans-unit.source: This language is used in Microsoft Office and users with experience of VBScript will also recognize it.
trans-unit.target: This language is used in Microsoft Office and users with experience of VBScript will also recognize it.

trans-unit.source: The Declarative Provisioning Expression Language is only using functions and is not a structured language; there are no methods or statements.
trans-unit.target: The Declarative Provisioning Expression Language is only using functions and is not a structured language; there are no methods or statements.

trans-unit.source: Functions will instead be nested to express program flow.
trans-unit.target: Functions will instead be nested to express program flow.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the expression language see <linkText>Understanding Declarative Provisioning Expressions</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For more information on the expression language see <linkText>Understanding Declarative Provisioning Expressions</linkText><title></title>
